CustomField.formula: Account.Name &"-"& Name &"-"& SAP_Service_Contract_Number__c & " (Start Date: "& TEXT( DAY(StartDate ))&"/"&TEXT( MONTH(StartDate ))&"/"&TEXT( YEAR(StartDate ))&")"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field that returns record Account-Contract Name-SAP Contract Number (Start Date)
CustomField.label: Lookup Formula
